page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MY MUM
page.content: SHE GOT UP AT 6.30 AND HAD A BATH. AFTER CHANGING SHE WENT DOWNSTAIRS AND HAD SOME MARMALADE AND TOAST. AFTER BRUSHING HER TEETH SHE PUT HER COAT ON AND DROVE FOR 45 MINS TO BRENTFORD. FIRST SHE TYPED SOME LETTERS TO OTHER AIRLINES. AFTER THAT SOME PEOPLE 'PHONED FOR TICKETS. THEN SHE HAD SOME TEA AND TYPED SOME TRAVEL FORMS. HER BOSS 'PHONED TO TELL HER TO TYPE SOME MORE LETTERS TO AIRLINES. AT 12.30 SHE HAD A CHEESE SANDWICH AND THEN HAD TO TYPE SOME MORE LETTERS. THEN SHE SHOWED A NEW GIRL ROUND THE OFFICE. SHE LEFT AT 5.30 AND DROVE TO THE NEWSAGENT,RETURNING HOME AT 6.15. SHE ATE AN APPLE AND READ THE PAPER AND THEN PREPARED DINNER_MEAT PIE AND SALAD.AFTER DINNER SHE WATCHED T.V.AND WENT TO BED AT 11.0.
